title: Sooty & Co.
brief_description: Three episodes of the British children’s television series, “Sooty & Co” written and presented by Matthew Corbett. Sooty has been a well-known and well-loved hand puppet character appearing on television since 1952. This cute little bear with his magic tricks and mischievous ways, along with his companions Sweep, Soo and Butch, will entertain and delight young children of pre-school age. Combines puppetry and animation with live action scenes.
